name: 2D Unity Clothing Store Demo
description:
This prototype was made for job applying purposes.

Controls

Control the player with WASD or the Arrow keys, on the shop you can use the mouse to click on each of the items to buy, it will automatically equip and trown away your current item.

On the sell Tab you can only sell the items you have equipped on the moment.

Software

Made with Unity 2022.1.0a13 Scripts made with C#

For the codes and Unity project for study feel free to access:

 JpBaraky/2DUnityClothingStoreDemo (github.com)
